info.name: Lichess Pieces (With Shadow)
info.description:
Lichess Pieces (With Shadow). Natural knight look, modern bishop, no cross on the king

Now it works properly with analysis board and puzzles as well
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
